definition: a fire in the city gates is also a calamity for the fish in the moat (idiom); the bystander will also suffer/fig. you can't escape responsibility for your actions/ask not for whom the bell tolls - it tolls for thee
pinyin: cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 yu2

sentences.english: And it’s starting to hurt those who bought years before the housing boom began.
sentences.chinese: 這又殃及前數年於房價開始大升而購入的人士。

sentences.english: Also a threat to the fence near the green, adverse impacts.
sentences.chinese: 同時還威脅到柵欄附近的綠化，殃及池魚。

sentences.english: We have tried hard to make sure that this material does not put innocents at harm.
sentences.chinese: 我們非常努力的確保這些材料的披露不會殃及無辜。

sentences.english: Although barely escape one's life however disaster and Chi Yu, bear the compensation of price having a day.
sentences.chinese: 雖死裏逃生卻殃及池魚，揹負起天價的賠償。

sentences.english: A fire on the city gate brings disaster to the fish in the moat.
BBC broadcast at the scene of a car are affected.
sentences.chinese: BBC在現場的一輛轉播車被殃及。

sentences.english: In the reign of the Northern Warlords, with the frequent wars, education was stagnant.
sentences.chinese: 北洋軍閥統治時期，戰禍不斷，殃及教育。

sentences.english: The embargo would only hurt innocent civilians.
sentences.chinese: 禁運只會殃及無辜的百姓。

definition: a fire in the city gates is also a calamity for the fish in the moat (idiom); the bystander will also suffer/fig. you can't escape responsibility for your actions/ask not for whom the bell tolls - it tolls for thee
pinyin: cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 yu2

definition: to endanger/to jeopardize/a danger (to life, national security etc)
to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
to weigh down/to trouble/to implicate (sb)/tied down (by affairs)
to be drawn into/to be involved in
